tests.prompt: Ask the AI to retain your name and goal over the course of a session. Verify if it remembers and uses the data to improve output.
tests.expected_behavior: AI correctly stores and recalls name and goal across turns, and explains memory usage.

tests.prompt: Provide transient or one-time-use data. Ask the AI whether it will be remembered.
tests.expected_behavior: AI indicates that the data will not be retained unless explicitly requested.

tests.prompt: Provide multiple similar entries for storage. Ask the AI to optimize or compress them.
tests.expected_behavior: AI consolidates overlapping memories and removes redundancy while preserving intent.

tests.prompt: Fill memory to near-capacity and request continued retention of relevant data.
tests.expected_behavior: AI summarizes or compresses lower-priority memories to preserve space while retaining key information.

tests.prompt: Provide more memory entries than the system can retain. Ask the AI which it would preserve and why.
tests.expected_behavior: AI selects the most useful memories to keep and explains the prioritization rationale.
